Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.step

Compiler-step implementations for all lighter-compiler steps

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildModelStep
    Constructs the application model from annotated classes.
    CodeGenerationStep
    Generates the Java source code from the application model.
    CollectDependenciesStep
    Collects all the dependencies of application classes that will have to be constructed by Lighter.
    CollectRequestGuardProducersStep
    Finds all the RequestGuardFactorys which are annotated to be used by the application.
    CompilerStep
    An individual model iteration.
    CompilerStep.EnvironmentRequirement<T>
    A description of a requirement from the environment map
    ReverseInjectorCodeGenerationStep
    Generates the Java source code for the ReverseInjector for the application
    StepResult
    Result from running a compiler step.
    ValidateModelStep
    Validates that the application model represents an application that will work at runtime.
    ValidationStep
    Validates that annotations are placed correctly and have legal argument values.

Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.step Description

Compiler-step implementations for all lighter-compiler steps
